item.title: Architectural changes in math.js v2
item.description: tl;dr Math.js v2 has been released a week ago. It has a completely reworked, modular architecture which allows creating custom builds. All functions have been rewritten into typed-functions. This takes away a lot of overhead for type checking and type conversions. These changes create a lot of flexibility in both extending and consuming the library. A week ago math.js v2 has been released, a big milestone! You can download it here.
